roleset.name: put between two things

example.name: literal or metaphorical?
example.text: He sandwiched his praise of constitutional meat between large loaves of bilious commentary.
example.arg: between large loaves of bilious commentary

roleset.note: I really think that's a beautiful sentence.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'sandwich' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.
